import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import {Avatar, IconButton} from '@material-ui/core'; import Table from '@mui/material/Table'; import TableBody from '@mui/material/TableBody'; import TableCell from '@mui/material/TableCell'; import TableContainer from '@mui/material/TableContainer'; import TableHead from '@mui/material/TableHead'; import TableRow from '@mui/material/TableRow'; import Paper from '@mui/material/Paper'; import axios from 'axios'; import BASE_URL from '../../Util/API'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Pages.scss'; function AccountDetails() { const {id} = useParams(); const [user, setUser] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { // set loading to true fetchUserDetails(); }, []); const fetchUserDetails = ()=> { axios.get(`${BASE_URL}/loans/summary/${id}`).then((response) => { setUser(response.data.results); console.log(user) // set user details to a variable and then set loading to false }); } return (

{user?.occupation}

82300

Tenured

Loan duration Due Paid Balance Last Payment Released Status *': { borderBottom: 'unset' } }} > 22,000 6 months 400,000 11,000 24,000 11000 25 Jan 2022 Open

Customer Primary Contact

{" "} {user?.phone_1}

{user?.email ? user.email:'N/A'}

{user.state_of_origin}/{user.local_government_area}

Personal Banking Information

Ahmed Hassan Peter({user?.banking_info?.bank})

A/C:{user?.banking_info?.account_number} BVN:{" "} N/A

{user?.guarantor_info?.employer_name ? user?.guarantor_info?.employer_name : 'N/A'}

No. 7 Durban Street

Guarantor

{user?.guarantor_info?.name ? user?.guarantor_info?.name : 'N/A'}

{user?.guarantor_info?.email} / {user?.guarantor_info?.phone ? user?.guarantor_info?.phone : 'N/A'}

) } export default AccountDetails
